name: Slime Rancher's Revenge
description:
This game is made for the Go Godot Jam 3 with the theme Evolution.

You play as a slime rancher who got banished from a kingdom thanks to the corrupted king and queen. As a revenge, you decide to have a slime rancher and destroy that kingdom with them.

The control is only using the mouse cursor and left mouse button.

The game exists on the gotm.io as well. Link:

https://gotm.io/steventhegamer/slime-ranchers-revenge
